fields.description: Jenkins CI build for JavaScriptCore for Windows should archive the resulting library binary (library for arm/x86, and include headers) and upload them to AWS so that Titanium CLI can pick up the latest one. It would be nice if it also updates titanium_mobile_windows project templates and CLI settings.
fields.summary: Windows: Archive & Upload JavaScriptCore CI build result onto AWS

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue has been fixed.
